title: Queenstown - Luge + Bungy
content:
Today was a day off the slopes, but we made a good day of it!
Started with some delicious breakfast from Halo (cafe), then organised luge and the ledge bungy at the top of the Skyline gondola complex!

Luge is heaps of fun, racing down the winding track overlooking the town and lake. And then doing the bungy haha. This was the first time I’ve ever bungy-jumped, and it was great fun! Definitely nervous at the start, and I can’t remember running off the ledge, but the free fall was a completely different experience - not scary (believing the setup was safe!), kinda fun and exciting! Then the recoil haha. The pull back and change of force was something else, and I wasn’t expecting it, so pretty sure I had a good groan haha. Still, lots of fun, and I’ve done it now!

After all that excitement, we did washing before going out to have Thai Siam for dinner - this was proper tasty as well!
